gini awi saha mathdrawya samanga galkissa polisiya magin athadanguwata gath angulane kudu gamini nohoth wanniaarachchige gamini namaththa saha ohuge aniyam biriya randawagena wadiduratath parikshana sidukarana bawa galkissa polisiya kiyayi.pereda 7 dina piliyandala polgasoowita pradeshaye di me mathdrawya jawaramkaru athadanguwata ganune heroyin gram 5 k saha ti 56 gini awiyak samanga eyata yodana pathoram 24k saha .38 riwolwarayak samanga eyata yodana pathoram 7 k samangini.nawina wargaye motar rathayakin mewa prawahanaya karamin sitiya di galkissa polisiye wishesha polis kandayamak mema watalima sidu kaleya.sakakara kudu gaminige wiwahaka biriya heroyin langa thaba ganime waradata rakshitha bandhanagara gathakara sitina athara athadanguwata pathwu aniyam biriya kumuduni hettiaarachchi namathi angulana pradeshaye kanthawaki.
thawada ohuge parshawayen waradak nomathiwa ohuta apahasayanta muhuna dimata siduwa atha.
